alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Jackson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 4:46PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jackson and northeastern DeKalb Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 446 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Section, or near Scottsboro, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scottsboro, Henagar, Sylvania, Hollywood, Powell, Section, Ider, Pisgah, Dutton and Langston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
